attributes.action: implement a system to have travel on the London Underground free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tube is almost a life-line in London. It generates a lot of business at the expense of people who are merely trying to get by.
Though I am not an economist I am sure that there exists a business model to operate the tube with no cost to travellers.
Ownership should not be by a publicly listed company, it should be by a co-operative representing the travellers.
Sponsorship by major businesses in London would also help.

It does sound very hard, but I'm sure the British spirit is there to pioneer something so incredible as a free city-wide transportation system.
